sentence: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Albus Dumbledore

sentence: I am what I am, an’ I’m not ashamed.
author: Rubeus Hagrid

sentence: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore

sentence: The world had ended, so why had the battle not ceased?
author: Professor Snape

sentence: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
author: Albus Dumbledore

sentence: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.
author: Albus Dumbledore

sentence: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and above all, pity those who live without love.
author: Albus Dumbledore

sentence: I am not worried, Harry. I am with you.
author: Albus Dumbledore
